knimeNode.name: MDS Projector
knimeNode.shortDescription: Performs a Classical Multi-Dimensional Scaling (MDS) on the data of the first input port. The objects from the second port are placed according to the dissimilarities of the first data port.

fullDescription.intro:
Performs a Classical Multi-Dimensional Scaling (MDS) on the data of the first input port. The objects from the second port are placed according to the dissimilarities of the first data port. For details see
Eigensolver Methods for Progressive Multidimensional Scaling of Large Data published by Brandes and Pich.
fullDescription.option: Select lower dimensionality to embed data into.
Select number of columns to be embedded into lower dimension.

option.name: Append all column not used for MDS:

fullDescription.option: Appends all columns (numeric and non-numeric) to the resulting lower-dimensional tables.
